dct_alternative_sm: Perspectivische vorstellung des berühmten Blocken oder Bloks Bergs : mit der jenigen gegend, so weit solche von dem, der auf der spitze des berges stehet, gefehen werden kan / gezeichnet von A. 1732 von L.S. Bestehorn.
dct_description_sm: Decorative cartouche held by mythical birds.
Includes index to some physical features and places.
View has two figures dancing on mountain and witches flying on goats and brooms above the mountain.
According to popular legend Brocken Mountain is the meeting place of the Walpurgis Night or Witches' Sabbath, the "Brocken scene" in Goethe's Faust is set here, it is often referred to as Blocksberg.
View of Brocken Mountain from the Northeast looking Southwest.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
